(Icedemon, I'm not sure, but I believe Inferno731 has created the characters 
Diablo, Baal, and Mephisto and has the profiles on the website and will play 
them when he has some free time.  So, you may want to verify it.  Just wanted 
to let you know in case you had to change the name)

Sun Crusher:




Sun Crusher landed only twenty feet near Baal.  He raised his arms in the 
air.  "Hold, robot.  I am Sun Crusher, follower of the Chaos-Bringer and 
member of the mighty Brotherhood.  May I ask who you are?"

Sun Crusher armed his weapons to full capacity.  His scanners detected a few 
robots heading this way.

"We must act quickly.  Enemies seeking to destroy us both head this way.  Our 
only chance is to join together and meet these enemies head on and crush 
them.  What do you say?  After the battle the Chaos-Bringer will give you 
great power as a reward, I assure you.  He often rewards victory.  Failure on 
the other hand...but anyway, I trail off."

"Will you join me and the Brotherhood?"
